transcript: I've given it three years of thought. I had hoped by now that he would forget about Larry and we'd have a regular wedding and everybody happy. But if that can't happen here, then I'll just have to get out.

I had hoped by now that he would forget about Larry and we'd have a regular wedding and
But if that can't happen here, then I'll just have to get out.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I've given it three years of thought.  And hope by now that he wouldn't.  Can you forget about Larry an-- and we can have a regular wedding and have everybody be happy.  But that can't happen here, I'm set to get out.
